progress.title: Progress
progress.exploreYourTrainingData: Explore your training data and insights
progress.estimated1RMTrendDescription: Track your training max (e1RM) per lift (Squat, Bench, Deadlift, OHP). Shows rate of improvement, strength plateau detection, and big jumps from blocks or cycles.
progress.topSetProgressionDescription: Track top weight × reps over time as a bubble chart. X-axis = date, Y-axis = weight, bubble size = reps. See progression like 405×1 → 405×3 → 420×1 → 425×1.
progress.weeklyVolumeDescription: Chart weekly volume (weight × reps × sets) for Squat family, Bench family, Deadlift family, Accessory volume, and Total volume. Essential for detecting under-training, overtraining, block transitions, deloads, and recovery issues.
progress.frequencyChartDescription: Bar showing how often you hit Squat, Bench, Deadlift, OHP, Accessory pulls, Core, and Upper back. Reveals training balance and helps coaches spot imbalances.
progress.weeklyVolumeLoadDescription: Weekly training volume (weight × reps) per lift. Helps track block transitions, deloads, and under/over-training trends.
progress.frequencyChartDescriptionShort: Sessions per week for a given lift. Highlights how consistently you are training each movement over time.
